TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Sipazi’, title = Sipazi’, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sipazi’} }

S.FORM: = Sipazi' = Gaga mniq Sincuseyn Ufungsyang ka alang Sipazi'. 126 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 377 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 93% niqan 349 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 7% niqan 28 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Tayal 71%, Saysiyat 19%, Amis 1%, Bunun 1%. Tnhangan alang Alang S-pa-er(Sipazi') Thiyan alang Alang Sipazi ida skgulun dhuq sayang phiyug wada niqan hmrinas dha kbkuy hnkwasan ri-s. Nniqan alang Sin-cu-seyn wu-hown-syang ta-yi cun. Klbangan Mtmay dgiyaq wu-hown kdadak keyn-sa na tgdaya gqian hidaw, mniq igi sibaw san-ping yayung, hraan hidaw U-ce-san na dxgal pdaka. Kndkilan lnglingay Spac kbkuy tnxalun sngari knbragan qsiya gsilung na dxgal pdaka. Kklaan ppanan Mlutuc syusan Teyn-c Nniqan seejiq alang Seejiq Atayal. Skari kari Kari Atayal, kari Tlu. Snhiyaan Pnyahan alang Tnpusu alang S-pa-r sbiyaw ida alang SaySayit, mniq brah yaa piya kbkuy hnkwasan, niqan duma seejiq Atyayal tmhjil miyah hini, tjiyal dha seejiq SaySayit, dhuq bukuy do tmalu da dhiya. Mseupu mniq, tbukuy do ida paah ayug Ta-ang wng-suey-cung na cikuh tnsapah seejiq Atayal tmhjil mniq, Brah hnkwasan kbukuy niqan cikuh tnsapah alang Suyo-rwang seejiq Tay-kang miyah tmhjil hini. Bitaq klwaan Ni-hon siida, Key-sa-cu Ni-hon yaa iyux spuwan sslian, kiya ka rima tnsapah seejiq thjilang na dhuq alang Wu-hwon sayang da, kiya ka Pnrjingan thjil mniq hini, bukuy Kwang-fu do, niqan duma seejiq o thjil sdalih Wu-hwon Siyang-Kong-suwo. Ida hbaraw ka hangan Lin, kiya ka tmngahan Lin-cya-cwan, ana bukuy na laqi laqi niqan ka mniq alang S-Pa-R uri. S-Pa-R hangan nii ga qnbhangan o paah patas Sing-Cu-Seyn rmngaw niqan kingal Yueyn-cu-ming msdungus mntucing maxal mspac lqlaqi, kiya ka tmhangan S-Pa-R, uxay uri o yabi knkiyux dha prana rmngaw, niqan duma rmngaw uri o rsrisaw Atayal miyah alang S-Pa-R siida, pelalay muda psisil han, yaasa dungus balay malu ka brah elelug, kido murus sinaw psiyus utux rudan, kiya ka smiyan utux rudan hini o, S-pa-ci ksun, yasa bukuy duri o miyah ka klmukan kika tmhangan S-Pa-R. Kklaan rrigan "Gaya na Atayal :Tmhjil ni pkrana"

= Sipazi' = Gaga mniq Sincoseyn Ufongsyang ka alang Sipazi'. 126 sapah ka kneego na sapah, 377 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnposo seejiq o mangal 93% niqan 349 hiyi sp, rahoq na oxay tnposo seejiq o mangal 7% niqan 28 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Tayal 71%, Saysiyat 19%, Amis 1%, Bonon 1%. Tnhangan alang Alang S-pa-er(Sipazi') Thiyan alang Alang Sipazi ida skgolon dhoq sayang phiyog wada niqan hmrinas dha kbkoy hnkwasan ri-s. Nniqan alang Sin-co-seyn wo-hown-syang ta-yi con. Klbangan Mtmay dgiyaq wo-hown kdadak keyn-sa na tgdaya gqian hidaw, mniq igi sibaw san-ping yayong, hraan hidaw U-ce-san na dxgal pdaka. Kndkilan lnglingay Spac kbkoy tnxalon sngari knbragan qsiya gsilong na dxgal pdaka. Kklaan ppanan Mlotoc syosan Teyn-c Nniqan seejiq alang Seejiq Atayal. Skari kari Kari Atayal, kari Tlo. Snhiyaan Pnyahan alang Tnposo alang S-pa-r sbiyaw ida alang SaySayit, mniq brah yaa piya kbkoy hnkwasan, niqan doma seejiq Atyayal tmhjil miyah hini, tjiyal dha seejiq SaySayit, dhoq bokoy do tmalo da dhiya. Mseopo mniq, tbokoy do ida paah ayog Ta-ang wng-soey-cong na cikoh tnsapah seejiq Atayal tmhjil mniq, Brah hnkwasan kbokoy niqan cikoh tnsapah alang Soyo-rwang seejiq Tay-kang miyah tmhjil hini. Bitaq klwaan Ni-hon siida, Key-sa-co Ni-hon yaa iyox spowan sslian, kiya ka rima tnsapah seejiq thjilang na dhoq alang Wo-hwon sayang da, kiya ka Pnrjingan thjil mniq hini, bokoy Kwang-fo do, niqan doma seejiq o thjil sdalih Wo-hwon Siyang-Kong-sowo. Ida hbaraw ka hangan Lin, kiya ka tmngahan Lin-cya-cwan, ana bokoy na laqi laqi niqan ka mniq alang S-Pa-R ori. S-Pa-R hangan nii ga qnbhangan o paah patas Sing-Co-Seyn rmngaw niqan kingal Yoeyn-co-ming msdongos mntocing maxal mspac lqlaqi, kiya ka tmhangan S-Pa-R, oxay ori o yabi knkiyox dha prana rmngaw, niqan doma rmngaw ori o rsrisaw Atayal miyah alang S-Pa-R siida, pelalay moda psisil han, yaasa dongos balay malo ka brah elelog, kido moros sinaw psiyos otox rodan, kiya ka smiyan otox rodan hini o, S-pa-ci kson, yasa bokoy dori o miyah ka klmokan kika tmhangan S-Pa-R. Kklaan rrigan "Gaya na Atayal :Tmhjil ni pkrana"
